documentation.text:
@dev Returns withdrawal withdrawal fee.
 @return The first value is fraction, the second one is fraction base

@dev Returns Proof of Deposit price decimal.
 Price should be displayed as `price / (10 ** priceDecimals)`.

@dev Returns total strategy tokens stored in an array.
 The output amount sequence is the strategyTokens() array sequence.
@dev Proof of Deposit net unit worth.

attributes.text:
@dev Returns withdrawal withdrawal fee.
 @return The first value is fraction, the second one is fraction base

@dev Returns Proof of Deposit price decimal.
 Price should be displayed as `price / (10 ** priceDecimals)`.

@dev Returns total strategy tokens stored in an array.
 The output amount sequence is the strategyTokens() array sequence.
@dev Proof of Deposit net unit worth.

Deposit(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,.details: Emit each time a deposit action happened.

params.tokensStored: How much each token is stored.

SetToken(address,address,address,address.details: Emit when strategy set or change function is called by owner.

params.tokensStored: How much each token is stored.

Withdraw(address,uint256,uint256,uint256.details: Emit each time a withdraw action happened.

params.tokensStored: How much each token is stored.

params.deadline: Unix timestamp after which the transaction will revert.
params.drcAmount: DRC amount user want to deposit.

getProofOfDepositPrice().details: Proof of Deposit net unit worth.

getUserVaultInDrc(address).details: Returns how much user's vault share in DRC amount.

returns._0: The first output is total worth in DRC,  second one is total DRC could withdraw (exclude fees),  and last output is fees in wei.

priceDecimals().details: Returns Proof of Deposit price decimal. Price should be displayed as `price / (10 ** priceDecimals)`.

totalTokenStored().details: Returns total strategy tokens stored in an array. The output amount sequence is the strategyTokens() array sequence.

params.deadline: Unix timestamp after which the transaction will revert.
params.drcAmount: DRC amount user want to withdraw.

withdrawPercentage(uint8,uint32).details: Withdraw a percentage of holding from DR.

params.deadline: Unix timestamp after which the transaction will revert.
params.percentage: Percentage of holding user want to withdraw.

returns._0: The first value is fraction, the second one is fraction base
